# bastion_group_member (Resource)

Manages a Bastion group member membership

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "bastion_group_member" "example" {
  group   = "example-group"
  account = "example-account"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `account` (String) The account name to add as a member
- `group` (String) The name of the Bastion group

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The resource identifier (group:account)

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import bastion_group_member.example example-group:example-account
```
